Class ApplicationRepository

java.lang.Object
main.repository.FileBasedRepository<Application,String>
main.repository.ApplicationRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
Repository<Application,String>
public class ApplicationRepository extends FileBasedRepository<Application,String>
Repository class for managing Application entities with file-based persistence. Provides CRUD operations and application-specific queries. Uses project name as the unique project identifier.
Since:
2025-04-17

    • save

      public boolean save(Application application)
      Saves a new application to the repository.
      Parameters:
      application - The application to save.
      Returns:
      true if the application was saved successfully, false if an application with the same ID already exists.

    • update

      Updates an existing application in the repository.
      Parameters:
      application - The application with updated information.
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false if the application was not found.
